section.heading: Implementation report.
section.text: No later than September 30, 2020, the ACSH shall submit a report to the Mayor and Council that:

para.text: Summarizes the work of the ACSH after October 30, 2018;
Discusses District agencies' implementation of model policies developed pursuant to § 7-2424(a); and
Summarizes elements of OHR's public information campaign, required by § 7-2424(c)(2).

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 1046 of Fiscal Year 2019 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2018 (D.C. Act 22-434, July 30, 2018, 65 DCR 8200).
For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 1046 of Fiscal Year 2019 Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2018 (D.C. Act 22-458, Oct. 3, 2018, 65 DCR 11212).
